item.title: Japan Tech Friends
item.description: A couple weeks ago, I was in japan for some family events. It was a great trip. Hanging out with Hiromi’s family and friends was awesome. Since we were going to be spending some free time in Tokyo, i decided to reach out to the Tokyo tech community and meet some people.Â I emailed my friend, Kristin, who had just been to Japan and asked her to hook me up with some cool cats in the tech scene.
